about_the_game:
Prione is an open-world, Third-person survival game. It also contains elements of horror, adventure, and puzzle-solving that create a hardcore gaming experience. The game is difficult but not overkill; surviving isn’t supposed to be easy. On your way, you will encounter many mysterious stories, clues, and puzzles leading to various paths that can be explored. Your main objective is to overcome the harsh and brutal wild. Not only will we make a great game, but we will also make it an enjoyable experience for everyone.

FEATURES (NOW)PATCH 1.0.0
* 4K Resolution Support*
* Multiplayer
A large Forest containing mysterious and customizable assets.
Small, medium, and massive creatures with different agendas.
You will need your wits and guts to survive the harsh desert.
Day/Night system that affects the player directly.
Random goals and missions.
Hidden and secret loot

content_descriptors.notes: Content may contain sexuality. referring to drugs and violent

name: PriOne

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHZ (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHZ (8 CPUs)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHZ (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHZ (8 CPUs)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Prione is an open-world, Third-person survival game. It also contains elements of horror, adventure, and puzzle-solving that create a hardcore gaming experience. The game is difficult but not overkill; surviving isn’t supposed to be easy.
supported_languages:
English*, Thai*, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
